title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Effective Presentation Design Strategies Based on Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Instructional design theory and teaching experience in social studies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically organize pre-learning materials to manage intrinsic cognitive load when designing presentations
Learners can create slides applying extraneous cognitive load reduction strategies, such as spatial/temporal continuity principles
Learners can implement presentation designs that promote germane cognitive load through personalized and interactive elements
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
